name: Pattern Recognition
description:
- Identifies logical patterns in sequences.
- Extends patterns based on rules.
- Used in data analysis and algorithms.
- Requires keen observation and logic.

name: Number Series
description:
- Analyzes sequences to find patterns.
- Predicts next number in series.
- Common in IQ and logic tests.
- Needs mathematical and logical skills.

name: Deductive Reasoning
description:
- Draws conclusions from given premises.
- Ensures logical validity of outcomes.
- Applied in real-world problem-solving.
- Demands strict logical thinking.

name: Critical Thinking
description:
- Analyzes facts for rational judgments.
- Evaluates argument validity.
- Used in decision-making processes.
- Requires analytical and logical skills.

name: Problem Solving
description:
- Approaches issues with logical steps.
- Finds solutions through reasoning.
- Applied in practical scenarios.
- Needs creative and analytical thinking.
